title: Distributive Property
text: The first step is to use the distributive property. $$\left(x+4\right) \left(3x-2y+5\right)$$ $$=$$ $$x\left(3x-2y+5\right)+4\left(3x-2y+5\right)$$
speech: The first step is to use the distributive property.  parentheses x plus 4,  times parentheses, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5    is equal to   x parentheses, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5  plus 4 times parentheses, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5
pacedSpeech: The first step is to use the distributive property.    x plus 4,  times , 3 x minus 2 y plus 5
x , 3 x minus 2 y plus 5  plus 4 times , 3 x minus 2 y plus 5

title: Multiply
text: The next step is to multiply those terms. $$x\left(3x-2y+5\right)+4\left(3x-2y+5\right)$$ $$=$$ $$3x^2-2xy+5x+12x-8y+20$$
speech: The next step is to multiply those terms.  x parentheses, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5  plus 4 times parentheses, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5    is equal to   3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20
pacedSpeech: The next step is to multiply those terms.   x , 3 x minus 2 y plus 5  plus 4 times , 3 x minus 2 y plus 5
3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20

title: Combining Like Terms
text: After you multiply, in order to simplify, you need to combine like terms. $$3x^2-2xy+5x+12x-8y+20$$ $$=$$ $$3x^2-2xy+5x+12x-8y+20$$
speech: After you multiply, in order to simplify, you need to combine like terms.  3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20   is equal to   3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20
pacedSpeech: After you multiply, in order to simplify, you need to combine like terms.   3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20
3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20

title: Simplifying
speech: Finally, you need to simplify.  3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20   is equal to   3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 17 x minus 8 y plus 20
pacedSpeech: Finally, you need to simplify.   3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20
3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 17 x minus 8 y plus 20
